inclusion.criterion: Written informed consent prior to breast-conserving surgery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Histologically confirmed unilateral primary invasive carcinoma of the breast
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age at diagnosis at least 18 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: imaging techniques with estimated tumor stage between cT1c-T3 prior to NAST
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: triple-negative or HER2-positive invasive breast cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: clinically and sonographically tumor-free axilla prior to core biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: planned breast-conserving surgery with postoperative external whole-breast irradiation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of malignancy within last 5 years, except curatively treated basalioma of the skin and carcinoma in situ of the cervix
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Time since last cycle of NAST >3 months (optimal <1 month)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer. A core biopsy revealed a 3 cm invasive ductal breast carcinoma in the left upper outer quadrant.
